lessons.title: What are Rituals?
lessons.content:
Rituals are intentional, repeated actions that create meaning, build community, and activate cultural lore. They transform ordinary moments into extraordinary experiences.

**Ritual Definition:**
‚Ä¢ Intentional actions
‚Ä¢ Repeated patterns
‚Ä¢ Meaning creation
‚Ä¢ Community bonding
‚Ä¢ Cultural activation

**Ritual Types:**
‚Ä¢ Initiation rituals (welcoming)
‚Ä¢ Celebration rituals (achievements)
‚Ä¢ Transition rituals (changes)
‚Ä¢ Healing rituals (support)
‚Ä¢ Bonding rituals (connection)

**Why Rituals Matter:**
‚Ä¢ Create belonging
‚Ä¢ Build identity
‚Ä¢ Strengthen bonds
‚Ä¢ Activate lore
‚Ä¢ Create memories
